metadata.description:
Who are Beachcrimes? We’re a duo from LA and we spent the last year making songs in hotel rooms around the world. Beachcrimes is the soundtrack to that adventure.
 
We made a lot of songs, and we’re excited to share them. All of them. This year we’re releasing 24 songs in 48 weeks. If we’re being real, it’s actually two albums – there’s AM and there’s PM. AM is the lite stuff, PM is the nite stuff. Think of it like the Summer Olympics and Winter Olympics, but for dance music.

"Melody (In My Head)" is the 4th of these 24 songs. It's the 2nd single from our AM album and we made it in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico. What would 75 & sunny sound like? We think it would sound like this. Heartbreak wrapped up in a tropical euphoric piano-house banger. If you happen to find yourself on a boat, pair to the bluetooth ASAP and be sure to give this one a spin. It will play just fine.

Next single will be out 2 weeks from today, and the following single 2 weeks after that.

lyrics.text:
This melody in my head
Reminding me to forget
All of the nights I spent on you

This melody in my head
Reminding me to forget
All of the nights I spent on you

Why you, Why you act like I mean nothing to you
I been there, yeah always right there for you
Now when I need you the most, you’re gone, 
You’re gone

I guess it’s bout time now that I face the music
Bass in my chest and my heart’s breaking to it
Tears on the floor, yeah I can’t do this anymore, more
It’s time to let you go
